Please ensure Bluetooth pairing has been completed prior. The Bluetooth pairing code is: 0000."

First pair your Android device to PIXEL which will show up as 'PIXEL' in Bluetooth using code 0000.

After physically mounting PIXEL in your desired location, now calibrate the proximity sensor.

First take a note of the proximity sensor value when no one is in front of PIXEL.

Then stand in the location where you want the proximity sensor to trigger displaying the image.

Based on that, then enter the lower and upper thresholds in the settings of this app.

When the user is within this range, the image(s) will then display.

You can also control how long the image displays via the Image Display Duration setting.
Only images in the pixelhalloween directory from the root of your SD card will be displayed. Checking this box displays all SD card pictures.
